item.title: Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Hey,

 I honestly have no idea what I'm doing wrong. I'm making my sites navigation bar in flash and I'm using the getURL function, and I'm trying to make it open the new page in the same window. Here's the code I'm using:

home.onRelease = function(){
    getURL("/index.html", "_self");
};

When I use the script assistant it says I have 1 error, heres the message:

**Error** Scene=Scene 1, layer=Home, frame=1:Line 1: Statement must appear within on handler
     home.onRelease = function(){

Yes, I set an instance for the button, “home”. Please help.

Thanks,

Buzzy[br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2007, 03:47:14 PM[/size][hr]Honestly, this has been here for almost a week! No one can help me?!?!

Read full topic
